nodes.text: The Mark 16 Enzymer was manufactured by BioTech Industries. Like other enzymers, the Mark 16 was capable of identifying biological residue and producing a counter-agent to known bacteria and viruses. Numbers, the Bith who ran the Irrational Number cantina at Jugsmuk Station on Gamorr, maintained a Mark 16 on the premises with a Registry program that was only a decade out of date.
